reviews.review_msg: I had two classes with him and he is the best prof ever. He is knowledgable,kind, nice and helpful. He offers differnt kinds of activities such as, group presentatin, exams, papers and group discussions to make his class very interesting. 3~4 hrs of his class went by very fast. His marking is fair but need to study hard for his exams!
No textbook for the course and extremly unclear instruction...
